channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0296; 07:05AM; 2706 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2uddP; #Westlake; The first 30 firefighters located a contents fire in a two-story commercial building and extinguished the flames in 13 minutes, containing the fire to one small room. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E211 E220 E229 E29 E6 EM11 RA11 RA6 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0296; 06:52AM; 637 S La Fayette Park Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/42jtTiN; #Westlake; Two-story commercial with moderate smoke showing from the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E211 E229 E29 E6 EM11 RA11 RA6 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0470; 09:38AM; 1165 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LPUZqB; #EastHollywood; 46 Firefighters took just 19 minutes of offensive firefighting operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a vacant, fenced and boarded 1,306 square foot one-story home (built 1919) filled and surrounded with debris, that was well involved with fire on their arrival. Flames were confined to the structure of fire origin, as well as vegetation to the rear. A comprehensive search of the debris filled structure discovered no injured persons. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E220 E227 E235 E35 E52 E6 EM5 RA35 RA52 RA835 T20 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0470; 09:19AM; 1184 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VOYXnZ; #EastHollywood; *Address Tentative*. PRELIM: Offensive fire attack against heavy fire showing from a vacant one-story home.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E220 E235 E35 E52 E6 RA35 RA52 RA835 T20 T35; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1041; 03:20PM; EB 210 Fwy east of Sunland Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUcvff; #Sunland; The fire involving the trash truck (semi tractor-trailer double) was quickly extinguished by LAFD responders. There was no immediate indication of another vehicle involved. The adult male truck driver has been transported by LAFD Paramedics to a regional trauma center in grave condition. No other injuries. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP Altadena Log #1602; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E24 E274 RA74 T74; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1041; 02:41PM; EB 210 Fwy east of Sunland Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUcvff; #Sunland; PRELIM: Overturned big rig (trash truck?) down embankment/into mountainside (with fire?). Driver of that vehicle discovered unresponsive and in grave condition. CHP Altadena Log #1602; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E24 E274 RA74 T74; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0673; 11:12AM; 2301 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VGKdaW; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision, van vs. (unspecified type or operator) 'tour bus'. No entrapment. At least five patients, no reports of serious injury. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #1988); FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; E76 E227 T27 RA27 E82 RA82 E41 RA97 T61 E261 RA35 RA56 RA60 EM18 EM14 EM11 BC5 CM52 RA827 RA889 RA810; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0194; 04:46AM; Sb 101 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/44CZaic; East Hollywood; Final patient count is 4: 1 deceased on scene, 1 transported (auto extrication required), 2 declined transportation. Ages/genders not available. Any further questions are referred to CHP (log number not available). ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA35 RA41 RA52 RA82 T27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0194; 04:26AM; Sb 101 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/44CZaic; East Hollywood; Three car collision with two cars fully involved in fire and one patient trapped. There are currently (possible to change once all persons on scene are assessed) four patients: Firefighters completed an extrication and patient #1 is being transported to the hospital in unknown condition. Patients #2 and #3 have minor, non-life threatening injuries. Patient #4 determined deceased on scene. Ages/genders of patients are unknown at this time. All SB 101FY lanes are closed and will impact morning commute for an unknown duration due to CHP fatality investigation. Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. 9-1-1 call was received at 4:02AM. No further details. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA35 RA41 RA52 RA82 T27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#0103; 02:04AM; 14423 W Dickens St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42wtPMn; Sherman Oaks; One story commercial building (approximately 100’ x 50’) had light smoke showing. 30 firefighters initiated an offensive fire attack and extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 1:37AM. No further details. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E278 E288 E99 RA88 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart
